Oh, this is it! This <color=#B41919>lock</color> on this flood gate.
This is definitely the one I saw before!
Right, there’s that strange pattern again...

Whoa, don’t go touching that, Miu. We don’t
know anything about it.

talking about?

This must be the path to the island that

In that case, we oughta use that key.
